channel.title: Rune trivia
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Rune trivia" - Metal gear solid

item.title: Re: Rune trivia
item.content:encoded:
my understanding of the runes were that they were all enemies… since they match up with the others better than like Raiden being Lightning and Solid Snake being… well Snake.

Runic Set: (All Boss Fights from Metal Gear Solid games)
Wolf Rune: Sniper Wolf
Snake Rune: Liquid Snake, Solidius Snake
Mantis Rune: Psycho Mantis
Ocelot Rune: Revolver Ocelot
Fox Rune: Grey Fox
Lightning Rune: Colonel Volgin

Advanced Set: (Beauty and the Beast Unit)
Laughing Rune: Laughing Octopus
Crying Rune: Crying Wolf
Raging Rune: Raging Raven
Screaming Rune: Screaming Mantis

item.title: Rune trivia
item.content:encoded:
I feel as though this should be added into the trivia when I saw the new runes that came out so i'll go ahead and write the connection

Wolf Rune: Sniper wolf, Boss from MGS 1
Snake Rune: Solid Snake, Main protagonist from MGS 1 & 4
Mantis Rune: Psycho Mantis, Boss from MGS 1
Ocelot rune: Revolver ocelot Boss from MGS 1, 3, and 4
Fox Rune: Grey Fox A.K.A The cyborg ninja, boss in MGS 1. NOTE: this could also be used as a reference to the FOX/FOXHOUND unit featured in the series
Lightning Rune: Raiden (In Japanese this word translates to thunder and lightning) Main protagonist OF MGS 2
Laughing Rune: Laughing octopus, Boss from MGS 4 part of the Beauty & the beast unit
Crying Rune: Crying wolf, Boss from MGS 4 part of the Beauty & the beast unit
Raging Rune: Raging raven, boss from MGS 4 part of the Beauty & the beast unit
Screaming Rune: Screaming mantis, boss from MGS 4 Leader of the Beauty & the beast unit
